meanings.meaning_en_US: Correct in all details; exact.

examples.sentence: The report was accurate and presented the facts well.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 報告是準確的，並很好地呈現了事實

examples.sentence: His calculations are always accurate.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的計算總是準確的

examples.sentence: We need accurate data for our analysis.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們需要準確的數據來進行分析

meanings.meaning_en_US: A colorless volatile liquid used as a solvent and in the manufacture of many chemicals.

examples.sentence: He drank too much [alcohol] at the party.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在派對上喝了太多酒精。

examples.sentence: It's important to understand the effects of [alcohol] on the body.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 了解酒精對身體的影響很重要。

examples.sentence: You should avoid mixing different types of [alcohol].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你應該避免混合不同類型的酒精。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Not cooked, especially food.

examples.sentence: She prefers her vegetables [raw].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她更喜歡生蔬菜。

examples.sentence: Eating [raw] fish can be dangerous if not prepared properly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 如果處理不當，吃生魚可能會危險。

examples.sentence: He made a salad with [raw] ingredients.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他用生材料做了沙拉。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To send goods or services to another country for sale.

examples.sentence: The country plans to [export] more agricultural products.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該國計劃出口更多農產品

examples.sentence: They [export] electronic goods to various markets.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們將電子產品出口至各個市場

examples.sentence: To boost the economy, the city will [export] its local crafts.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 為了促進經濟，該市將出口當地工藝品

meanings.meaning_en_US: Occurring or done at once; instant.

examples.sentence: We need an [immediate] response to the situation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們需要對這個情況即時回應

examples.sentence: Her [immediate] reaction was surprising.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的即時反應令人驚訝

examples.sentence: He sought [immediate] medical attention.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他尋求即時的醫療照顧

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who trains and instructs athletes or performers.

examples.sentence: The [coach] guided the team to victory.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 教練帶領球隊獲得勝利

examples.sentence: She hired a personal [coach] to improve her fitness.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她聘請了一位私人教練來改善她的健身

examples.sentence: Our [coach] has a lot of experience in the sport.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們的教練在這項運動上有很多經驗

meanings.meaning_en_US: To train or instruct someone in a skill or area.

examples.sentence: She will [coach] the beginners in swimming.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她會指導初學者游泳

examples.sentence: He is [coaching] the local football team this season.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他本賽季正在指導當地足球隊

examples.sentence: They decided to [coach] new employees on company policies.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們決定對新員工進行公司政策的培訓

meanings.meaning_en_US: The assembled spectators or listeners at a public event, such as a play, movie, concert, or meeting.

examples.sentence: The [audience] clapped enthusiastically after the performance.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 演出結束後，觀眾熱情地鼓掌。

examples.sentence: She spoke directly to the [audience] during her speech.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在演講時直接對觀眾講話。

examples.sentence: The film captivated the [audience] from start to finish.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這部電影從頭到尾都吸引了觀眾。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A device for making an electrical connection.

examples.sentence: Please make sure to use the correct [plug] for the device.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請確保使用正確的插頭連接設備。

examples.sentence: He pulled the [plug] from the socket.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他從插座拔掉插頭。

examples.sentence: The [plug] is not compatible with this outlet.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個插頭與此插座不兼容。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Relating to or derived from living matter.

examples.sentence: I prefer [organic] food for a healthier diet.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我更喜歡有機食品以更健康的飲食。

examples.sentence: They sell [organic] vegetables at the market.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在市場上出售有機蔬菜。

examples.sentence: Her garden is filled with [organic] produce.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的花園裡充滿了有機農產品。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A district or area surrounding a particular place.

examples.sentence: They live in a quiet [neighborhood].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們住在一個安靜的鄰近地區

examples.sentence: Community events help bring the [neighborhood] together.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 社區活動幫助讓鄰近地區團結在一起

examples.sentence: The [neighborhood] is known for its parks.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個鄰近地區以其公園而聞名

meanings.meaning_en_US: Dedicated or consecrated to God or a religious purpose.

examples.sentence: The [holy] book is revered by millions.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這本神聖的書受到數百萬人的尊敬。

examples.sentence: Many visit the [holy] site for pilgrimage.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多人去該神holy聖之地朝聖。

examples.sentence: She devoted her life to [holy] service.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她將自己的生命奉獻給神聖的服務。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Help or advice that shows the way.

examples.sentence: She sought [guidance] from her mentor.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她向導師尋求指導

examples.sentence: The students need [guidance] for their projects.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 學生們需要對他們項目的指導

examples.sentence: The book offers excellent [guidance] on time management.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這本書對時間管理提供了很好的指導

meanings.meaning_en_US: A path or track made for walking or hiking.

examples.sentence: The [trail] through the woods is very scenic.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 穿越森林的小道非常美麗。

examples.sentence: We followed the [trail] up to the mountain summit.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們沿著小道走到山頂。

examples.sentence: She got lost on the hiking [trail].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在健行小道上迷路了。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The process of voting in an election.

examples.sentence: Voter turnout was high in the [poll].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 投票率在此次投票中很高。

examples.sentence: The [poll] results will be announced tomorrow.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 投票結果將於明天公佈。

examples.sentence: Every citizen should participate in the [poll].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每位公民都應該參加投票。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A tavern or bar, especially in Britain.

examples.sentence: They met at the local [pub] for a drink.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在當地酒吧見面喝酒。

examples.sentence: The [pub] was crowded on Friday night.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 酒吧在星期五晚上很擁擠。

examples.sentence: He enjoys listening to music at the [pub].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他喜歡在酒吧裡聽音樂。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A part of a whole; a section or piece.

examples.sentence: He took a smaller [portion] of the cake.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他拿了蛋糕的一小部分

examples.sentence: They divided the land into equal [portions].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們把土地分成了相等的部分

examples.sentence: Each [portion] of the meal was carefully prepared.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每一部分的餐點都經過了精心準備

meanings.meaning_en_US: A soft, fluffy fiber from the cotton plant used to make textiles.

examples.sentence: The shirt is made of 100% [cotton].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這件襯衫是100%棉花製成的。

examples.sentence: She prefers sleeping on [cotton] sheets.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她偏好用棉花床單睡覺。

examples.sentence: The factory produces high-quality [cotton].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該工廠生產高品質的棉花。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Free time when one is not working or being occupied.

examples.sentence: I enjoy reading during my [leisure] time.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我喜歡在閒暇時閱讀。

examples.sentence: He spends his [leisure] hours hiking.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在閒暇時間裡去爬山。

examples.sentence: Traveling is my favorite [leisure] activity.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 旅行是我最喜歡的閒暇活動。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Famous or important in history.

examples.sentence: The signing of the treaty was a [historic] moment.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 條約的簽署是一個歷史性的時刻。

examples.sentence: She visited a [historic] site on her vacation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在假期中參觀了一個歷史性地點。

examples.sentence: His [historic] speech inspired a generation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的歷史性演講激勵了一代人。
